description: A start flow created along with the agent

text: Hello, Welcome to Deuk Spine Institute!! How can I help you today?
I can certainly guide you on the causes of your back pain and also some of the best treatments we have to offer.

transitionRoutes.name: 7d0ebd8a-16a3-423d-bcf9-c8369a7c049c
transitionRoutes.description:
Welcome the user to the chat session with a warm welcome from Deuk Spine Institute. 

Followed by an option to understand their spinal condition or go through the treatments that we offer.

Finally, a GIF of Deuk Spine Institute.

transitionRoutes.name: a068b992-b550-412c-a9cf-ba1f38705604
transitionRoutes.description: The user asks the agent that they have a severe back pain.
